description.en:
Balloon Coin, which is used in the social-dating app Hot-Talk, will increase its value through the use of blockchains and AI technology. Balloon coin investors will benefit from investing in content services such as block-chaining, AI, online games, and WebTuning as well as social dating services through the purchase of balloon coins. 

The mined tokens are linked with blockchains, AI, mobile games, etc., and are used as cash through the online, offline Balloon-Coin merchants.
